item.title: 011 - Living in the Moment
item.description: I don’t think I’m that good at living in the moment. I’m not sure I have a great definition of even what it means, but I have a feeling I’m not that good at it. I’m always thinking about the future. Mostly I’m thinking about projects I have going on and what’s the next step that I can work on to make progress. And I even spend a lot of time brainstorming potential projects.
